title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
description: Miles Morales catapults across the multiverse, where he encounters a team of spider-people charged with protecting its very existence.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: Jake Sully and Neytiri have formed a family and are doing everything to stay together. But they must leave their home and explore the different regions of Pandora.
tagline: The Way of Water is the Way Forward.

title: The Batman
description: When the Riddler, a sadistic killer, begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's darkest corners.

title: Jurassic World: Dominion
description: The fate of humanity hangs in the balance when dinosaurs and humans must co-exist after the events of Jurassic World.
tagline: The battle between man and dinosaur continues.

title: The Flash
description: Barry Allen uses his superpowers to travel back in time to prevent his mother's death, which brings unintended consequences to his timeline.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
description: The Guardians embark on a mission to defend Rocket from a high-tech bounty hunter, facing their pasts in the process.

title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
description: Wakanda must defend itself from foreign threats following the death of its king, and a new hero emerges to protect the nation.
tagline: The world will be forever changed.
